# Welcome

I am a Data Analyst working at [UF Health Integrated Data Repository](https://idr.ufhealth.org/). My work primarily focuses on designing and developing data science pipelines to improve the coverage and quality of the data, primarily for the [OneFlorida+ Clinical Research Consortium](https://onefloridaconsortium.org/). Additionally, I also help research at UF by providing consultation for research teams, supporting feasibility and cohort discovery, and receiving and fulfilling research data requests.

Previously, I have working as a Statistical Data Analyst at [Department of Epidemiology](https://epidemiology.phhp.ufl.edu/) working on research projects with NIH, NCATS, CDC and NIDA to design targeted interventions.

# Work

[Data Management Analyst III]{.underline} \| UF Health IDR (02/23-now)

-   Liaison between IDR and OneFlorida+ Clinical Research Network
-   Design and develop data science pipelines to improve the coverage and quality of the data
-   Working as an honest broker for research data focusing on electronic health records
-   Running ETL pipelines for OneFlorida+ data refresh, All of Us Research Program, UF Health Tumor Registry, COVID-19 PCORI data refresh, National COVID Cohort Collaborative (N3C), OneFlorida+ i2b2 refresh and other data requests
-   Develop software and packages to run and validate data in OMOP Common Data Model
-   Conduct OneFlorida+ i2b2 trainings and workshops for hospital and research partners and working with OneFlorida+ Coordinating Center to process new user provisioning

[Data Management Analyst II]{.underline} \| UF Department of Epidemiology (06/18 - 02/23)

-   Lead Statistician on projects with NIH, NCATS, CDC and NIDA to design targeted interventions
-   Creating visualizations, hotspots and heatmap analysis for community intervention planning
